DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must read , understood sign informed consent form ; 2 . Subjects must 18 70 year age ; 3 . Subjects must able willing follow study procedure instruction ; 4 . Subjects must indication receive two implant bilateral maxillary mandibular edentulous area ( least 4 month post extraction ) area premolar ( first second ) molar ( firstor second ) ; 5 . Sufficient width height bone place least 8mm length compatible diameter Ankylos implant ; 6 . Sufficient vertical clearance place single tooth crown replacement ; 7 . No apical disorder/inflammation area implant site . 1 . Subjects participate clinical study within 1 month prior screen and/or involve therapeutic intervention ( either medical dental ) could affect bone soft tissue healing ; 2 . Female subject pregnant lactating , intend become pregnant study period follow entrance study ; 3 . Subjects parafunctional habit ; 4 . Subjects fail maintain good plaque control ; 5 . Subjects systemic condition like uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , cancer , HIV , disorder compromise wound healing , chronic high dose steroid therapy , bone metabolic disease , radiation immunosuppressive therapy would preclude periodontal surgery ; 6 . Absence occlusal stability centric occlusion ; 7 . Subjects presence acute infectious lesion area intend surgery ; 8 . History within last 3 month weekly frequent use smokeless chew tobacco , pipe cigar smoking cigarette smoking ( great 10 cigarette per day ) 9 . Present alcohol drug abuse ; 10 . Angulation requirement restoration exceed approximately 15 degree ; 11 . Systemic corticosteroid medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration ( e.g . calcium channel blocker , dilantin ) .
